ELEMENT.SHORT: Banner, followed by a two column prodlist and then some text.
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: This layout features a wide banner, followed by the products in a two column format. The product list has a good sized thumbnail and detailed product information, including name, manufacturer, price, msrp, savings and a portion of the description. After the product list is a wiki friendly text box.
ELEMENT.TITLE: Wide banner, followed by a two column product list that contains a good size thumbnail, plus detailed product info. After that is a wiki friendly text block.
